name: Suzan Arslanturk
content: Dr. Suzan Arslanturk - College of Engineering - Wayne State University Search: Search Admissions Programs Students Faculty Research Alumni Community partners About Menu College of Engineering Dr. Suzan Arslanturk Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science Contact Welcome I am an Assistant Professor of Computer Science and the Director of the Machine Learning and Health Informatics Laboratory at Wayne State University. I received my B.Sc. in Computer Engineering and MS and PhD degrees in Computer Science and Informatics in 2011 and 2015, respectively. I have worked as a research scientist for a healthcare consulting company in Michigan while completing my Ph.D. My research focuses on developing novel methodologies and models in predictive analytics for improving clinical performance and enhancing health outcomes using data science. In my lab, we explore various aspects of predictive analytics, including mining large datasets, statistical modeling, and computational intelligence. I collaborate extensively with medical and health professionals, as well as other domain experts, which contributes to the interdisciplinary nature of my publication outlets. If you are interested in joining my group to pursue research for a Ph.D. or M.S., please visit my Research Group page.
